qna.a:
La ley de California requiere que los accidentes de tráfico sean reportados al DMV dentro de 10 días si hubo una lesión, muerte o daño a la propiedad en exceso de $1,000. Un SR22 es un formulario de seguro que debe ser presentado al DMV para reinstaurar su licencia después de una suspensión. Si tiene más preguntas sobre SR 22s, comuníquese con su compañía de seguros. El DMV puede tardar hasta 30 días en recibir un SR22.
{{#ifCond SessionAttributes.QNAClientFilter '===' 'miles'}}
* [Report of Traffic Accident Occurring in California (SR-1)](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/dmv-virtual-office/accident-reporting/)
* [Report of Traffic Accident Occurring in California (SR-1) (PDF)](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/file/report-of-traffic-accident-occurring-in-california-sr-1-pdf/)
* [Insurance Requirements](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/vehicle-registration/insurance-requirements/)
* [Vehicle Collisions](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/driver-education-and-safety/educational-materials/fast-facts/vehicle-collisions-ffdl-16/)
{{/ifCond}}

qna.a:
Una REAL ID tiene un oso y una estrella en la esquina superior derecha. A partir del 3 de mayo de 2023, un REAL ID le permite embarcar en un vuelo nacional y entrar en instalaciones federales seguras o bases militares. Una tarjeta Federal No-Compliant indica que se aplican l�mites federales, lo que significa que su licencia de conducir o tarjeta de identificaci�n no puede ser utilizada como identificaci�n para prop�sitos federales oficiales. Puede ser necesaria una identificaci�n adicional.

qna.a: If you meet income requirements from a public assistance program, you may qualify for a reduced fee ID card. qna.a:
California law requires traffic accidents to be reported to DMV within 10 days if there was an injury, death, or property damage in excess of $1,000. An SR22 is an insurance form that must be submitted to DMV to reinstate your license following a suspension. For further questions about SR 22s, contact your insurance carrier. It can take up to 30 days for DMV to receive an SR22.
{{#ifCond SessionAttributes.QNAClientFilter '===' 'miles'}}
* [Report of Traffic Accident Occurring in California (SR-1)](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/dmv-virtual-office/accident-reporting/)
* [Report of Traffic Accident Occurring in California (SR-1) (PDF)](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/file/report-of-traffic-accident-occurring-in-california-sr-1-pdf/)
* [Insurance Requirements](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/vehicle-registration/insurance-requirements/)
* [Vehicle Collisions](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/driver-education-and-safety/educational-materials/fast-facts/vehicle-collisions-ffdl-16/)

qna.a:
If your current name is different than the name on your identity document you must bring a document with the new name. All name change documents are needed if your name has changed multiple times.
The Social Security Administration must have your current name. Individuals may self-select a gender identity, but name/gender changes require an office visit. To correct a mistake or misspelled name on a driver's license or identification card, an office visit is also required.

qna.a:
Renewal notices are mailed to the address on record 75 days prior to the expiration date and indicate if you are eligible to renew a vehicle online, by mail. If eligible to renew online, you can also renew at a DMV Kiosk. Address changes must be made 3 days prior to renewing. If you are required to provide proof of insurance, you may do so electronically (if eligible) using the Submitting Insurance and Obtaining a Smog link, by mail.
{{#ifCond SessionAttributes.QNAClientFilter '===' 'miles'}}
* [Vehicle Registration Renewal](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/vehicle-registration/vehicle-registration-renewal/)
* [DMV NOW Kiosks](https://cadmvnowkiosk.com/)
* [Renewal Processing Times](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/about-the-california-department-of-motor-vehicles/renewal-processing-times/)
* [Registration Renewal FAQs](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/vehicle-registration/vehicle-registration-renewal/frequently-asked-questions-renewing-your-registration/)

qna.a:
Un permiso de instrucción es para individuos que están trabajando en los requisitos para obtener una licencia de conducir para automóviles y/o motocicletas. Si usted es menor de 18 años de edad, usted debe completar la educación de conductor en el salón de clases y matricularse en entrenamiento de conductor detrás del volante en una escuela de entrenamiento de conductor con licencia antes de que usted pueda obtener su permiso de instrucción. Nota: Visite una oficina del DMV para obtener un permiso de instrucción de reemplazo. La fecha de caducidad sigue siendo la misma.
{{#ifCond SessionAttributes.QNAClientFilter '===' 'miles'}}
* [Instruction Permits](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/driver-licenses-identification-cards/instruction-permits/)
* [Driver's Education and Safety](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/driver-education-and-safety/)
* [Driver's Training Schools](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/driver-education-and-safety/driver-training-schools)
* [Driver's Handbooks](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/driver-handbooks/)
{{/ifCond}}

qna.a:
El DMV emite licencias de conducir comerciales (CDL) para garantizar que los conductores cumplan con nuestros altos estándares para operar vehículos comerciales motorizados (CMV). Antes de poder obtener una licencia de manejar de California de cualquier tipo, debe aprobar exámenes de conocimientos y de manejo. Para operar vehículos específicos, un conductor debe tener un certificado, además de una licencia de manejar. Para obtener una lista completa de certificados, avales y requisitos de prueba, consulte Certificados y avales de licencias de manejar y Clases y certificaciones de licencias de conducir comerciales a continuación. La lista de verificación previa a la conducción se encuentra en la Lista de verificación de inspección del vehículo y se incluye en el manual complementario de la CDL.
{{#ifCond SessionAttributes.QNAClientFilter '===' 'miles'}}

qna.a:
A recreational vehicle is a motorhome, house car, travel trailer, truck camper, or camp trailer; with or without motive power; designed for human habitation or other occupancy. Recreational vehicles are subject to standard vehicle registration but are not eligible to be put on planned non-operation. For information on a fifth-wheel travel trailer or the recreational trailer endorsement refer to the Recreational Vehicles and Trailers handbook.

{{#ifCond SessionAttributes.QNAClientFilter '===' 'miles'}}
* [Planned Non-Operation Filing](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/vehicle-registration/vehicle-registration-renewal/file-for-planned-non-operation/)
* [Affidavit of Non-Use](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/vehicle-registration/affidavit-of-non-use/)
* [Additional PNO Information](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/driver-education-and-safety/educational-materials/fast-facts/reporting-vehicle-status-ffvr-1/)
* [Vehicle Registration Fee Calculator](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/wasapp/FeeCalculatorWeb/renewalForm.do)
* [Recreational Vehicles and Trailers Handbook](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/file/recreational-vehicles-trailers-handbook-pdf/)
{{/ifCond}}

If your driver's license or ID card is stolen or misused, contact DMV at 1 866 658 5758, or d l fraud@ d m v dot ca dot gov, to inquire about the steps to take to protect your identity. Do not include any personal identifying information on your email.  
Important: If your driver's license, ID card, or vehicle was stolen, contact your local police department.

qna.a: Traffic tickets and accidents are assigned 0, 1, or 2 points. 0 and 1 point tickets and accidents remain on your driver’s record for 39 months. 2 point tickets remain on your driver’s record for 10 to 13 years depending on the violation. You can find out what is on your record by requesting your record online, at a DMV kiosk, or speaking with a DMV agent through live chat or phone.

qna.a:
If a person has repaired, furnished supplies/materials for, towed, or stored a vehicle and has not been paid for services rendered, that person may place a lien against the vehicle. The lien may be satisfied by getting a court judgment or selling the vehicle through a lien sale process outlined in the How To: Conduct a Lien Sale for a Vehicle valued at $4,000 or less (HTVR-7) brochure on the DMV website. To conduct a lien sale, the person/lienholder must have possession of the vehicle.

{{#ifCond SessionAttributes.QNAClientFilter '===' 'miles'}}
* [Lien Sales FAQs](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/driver-education-and-safety/educational-materials/how-tos/lien-sales-frequently-asked-questions/)
* [How To: Conduct a Lien Sale for a Vehicle Valued at $4,000 or Less](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/how-to-conduct-a-lien-sale-for-a-vehicle-valued-at-4000-or-less-htvr-7/)
* [How To: Conduct a Lien Sale for a Vehicle Stored at a Self-Service Storage Facility or Valued Over $4,000](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/how-to-conduct-a-lien-sale-for-a-vehicle-stored-at-a-self-service-storage-facility-or-valued-over-4000-htvr-8/)
* [How To: Dispose of a Vehicle Valued at $500 or Less Removed by a Public Agency](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/how-to-dispose-of-a-vehicle-valued-at-500-or-less-removed-by-a-public-agency-htvr-6/)
{{/ifCond}}

qna.a: Gasoline and hybrid powered vehicles model year 1976 or newer require a smog certification, once every two years once they are seven model years old. Diesel and natural gas powered vehicles model year 1998 and newer with a gross vehicle weight under fourteen thousand pounds require a smog certification every two years once they are two model years old. Out of state vehicles that are being registered in California for the first time, are required to get a smog certification. If your car fails the smog inspection, you should contact the Bureau of Automotive Repair Referee Program. They can help you find out what your next steps are. Their contact number is 1,800 6,2,2 7,7,3,3.

qna.a:
Un permiso de instrucción es para individuos que están trabajando en los requisitos para obtener una licencia de conducir para automóviles y/o motocicletas. Si usted es menor de 18 años de edad, usted debe completar la educación de conductor en el salón de clases y matricularse en entrenamiento de conductor detrás del volante en una escuela de entrenamiento de conductor con licencia antes de que usted pueda obtener su permiso de instrucción. Nota: Visite una oficina del DMV para obtener un permiso de instrucción de reemplazo. La fecha de caducidad sigue siendo la misma.
{{#ifCond SessionAttributes.QNAClientFilter '===' 'miles'}}
* [Instruction Permits](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/driver-licenses-identification-cards/instruction-permits/)

qna.a:
DMV issues commercial driver's licenses (CDLs) to ensure drivers meet our high standards for operating commercial motor vehicles (CMVs). Before you can get a California driver’s license of any kind, you need to pass knowledge and drive tests. To operate specific vehicles, a driver must carry a certificate, in addition to a driver's license. For a complete list of certificates, endorsements, and testing requirements, see Driver License Certificates and Endorsements, and Commercial Driver’s License Classes and Certifications below. The pre-drive checklist is located under Vehicle Inspection Checklist and included in the supplement CDL handbook.
{{#ifCond SessionAttributes.QNAClientFilter '===' 'miles'}}

qna.a: Puede cambiar su dirección en línea o por correo. Usted no recibirá una nueva licencia de conducir, identificación o tarjeta de registro cuando cambie su dirección. Para obtener un reemplazo con su dirección actualizada, solicite en línea o en un quiosco del DMV. Nota: Por motivos de seguridad, Miles no puede verificar la dirección actual registrada.

qna.a:
If your current name is different than the name on your identity document you must bring a document with the new name. All name change documents are needed if your name has changed multiple times.
The Social Security Administration must have your current name. Individuals may self-select a gender identity, but name/gender changes require an office visit. To correct a mistake or misspelled name on a driver's license or ID card, an office visit is also required.
{{#ifCond SessionAttributes.QNAClientFilter '===' 'miles'}}

qna.a:
* The Occupational Licensing (OL) Branch is responsible for licensing and monitoring a wide range of motor vehicle related businesses and individuals.

* DMV has launched new online services to let customers apply for, renew, or modify their Occupational Licenses online. Our new user-friendly online portal is the quickest and easiest way to manage your Occupational License. 
*DMV has also renamed the Occupational Licensing Status Information System (OLSIS) to Occupational Licensing Lookup (OLL). OLL is an online lookup tool used to verify the DMV occupational license (OL) status of businesses across several categories. Select the links below to get started. 
* Need help? Contact our Occupational Licensing team for assistance 1-877-563-5213.

{{#ifCond SessionAttributes.QNAClientFilter '===' 'miles'}}

* [Learn more about Occupational Licenses.](https://dmv.ca.gov/portal/vehicle-industry-services/occupational-licensing/)

qna.a:
A partir del 7 de mayo de 2025, se requerirá una identificación REAL para embarcar en vuelos dentro de los EE.UU. Y para entrar en instalaciones federales seguras o bases militares. Para solicitar una licencia DE conducir DE identificación REAL o una tarjeta de identificación, las regulaciones federales requieren que usted presente 1 documento de identidad, 2 documentos de residencia, y proporcione su número de seguro social. Para ahorrar tiempo, cargue sus documentos para revisarlos antes de su visita. Nota: Una identificación REAL es una licencia de conducir o una tarjeta de identificación con una certificación agregada para convertirla en una forma de identificación aceptada por el gobierno federal. No es una tarjeta separada. No se requiere que los menores tengan una identificación REAL. Obtenga una identificación REAL en algunas oficinas AAA durante un tiempo limitado sólo con cita previa. Para obtener más información, seleccione el enlace de ID REAL en las oficinas de AAA a continuación.
{{#ifCond SessionAttributes.QNAClientFilter '===' 'miles'}} 
* [What Is REAL ID?](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/driver-licenses-identification-cards/real-id/what-is-real-id/) 
* [How do I get a REAL ID](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/driver-licenses-identification-cards/real-id/how-do-i-get-a-real-id/) 
* [REAL ID at AAA](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/aaa-real-id/) 
* [REAL ID Step by Step Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ie9idjlUhiY) 
{{/ifCond}}

qna.a: Vehículos de Gasolina e híbridos del modelo del año 1976 o más nuevos requieren una certificación del smog, una vez cada dos años o una vez que son siete años viejos. Diesel y gas natural del modelo del año 1998 o más nuevos con un peso bruto de catorcemil libras requieren una certificación del smog cada dos años una vez que son un ano viejo. Vehículos que vienen de fuera del estado que van a ser registrados en California por primera vez, son requeridos obtener una certificación del smog. Si tu carro falla la inspección del smog, debe comunicarse con el Programa de árbitros de la Oficina de reparación automotriz. Ellos te pueden ayudar a encontrar cuál es tu siguiente paso. Su número de contacto es 1,800 6,2,2, 7,7,3,3

qna.a: A los boletos de tráfico y a los accidentes se les asignan 0, 1 o 2 puntos. Los boletos de 0 y 1 puntos y los accidentes permanecen en su expediente de conductor por 39 meses. Los boletos de 2 puntos permanecen en el registro de su conductor por 10 a 13 años dependiendo de la violación. Usted puede averiguar qué hay en su expediente solicitando su expediente en línea, en un quiosco del DMV, o hablando con un agente del DMV a través de chat en vivo o por teléfono.

qna.a:
An instruction permit is for individuals who are working on the requirements to get a driver's license for autos and/or motorcycles. If you are under 18 years old, you must complete classroom driver's education and enroll in behind-the-wheel driver's training at a licensed driver's training school before you can get your instruction permit. Note: Visit a DMV office to obtain a replacement instruction permit. The expiration date remains the same.
{{#ifCond SessionAttributes.QNAClientFilter '===' 'miles'}}
* [Instruction Permits](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/driver-licenses-identification-cards/instruction-permits/)
* [Teen Guide to Getting Your License](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/teen-drivers/)

{{/ifCond}}

qna.a:
A REAL ID has a bear and star in the top right corner. Starting May 7, 2025, a REAL ID allows you to board a domestic flight and enter secure federal facilities or military bases. A Federal Non-Compliant card states "Federal Limits Apply," which means that your driver's license or ID card cannot be used as identification for official federal purposes. Additional identification may be required.

{{#ifCond SessionAttributes.QNAClientFilter '===' 'miles'}} 
* [What Is REAL ID?](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/driver-licenses-identification-cards/real-id/what-is-real-id/)

* [REAL ID at AAA](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/aaa-real-id/) 
* [REAL ID Step by Step Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ie9idjlUhiY) 
{{/ifCond}}

qna.a:
A vehicle can be placed on planned non-operation (PNO) during the registration renewal period (75 days before and 90 days after the registration expiration date). If it is before the renewal period, you may submit an Affidavit of Non-Use (ANU). If it is after the renewal period, you must pay registration. To remove a PNO, full registration renewal fees must be paid prior to operating the vehicle to avoid penalties. 
{{#ifCond SessionAttributes.QNAClientFilter '===' 'miles'}}
* [Planned Non-Operation Filing](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/vehicle-registration/vehicle-registration-renewal/file-for-planned-non-operation/)
* [Affidavit of Non-Use](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/vehicle-registration/affidavit-of-non-use/)
* [Additional PNO Information](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/driver-education-and-safety/educational-materials/fast-facts/reporting-vehicle-status-ffvr-1/)
* [Vehicle Registration Fee Calculator](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/wasapp/FeeCalculatorWeb/renewalForm.do)
{{/ifCond}}

qna.a:
Si su nombre actual es diferente del nombre que aparece en su documento de identidad, deberá traer un documento con el nuevo nombre. Todos los documentos de cambio de nombre son necesarios si su nombre ha cambiado varias veces.
La Administración del Seguro Social debe tener su nombre actual. Los individuos pueden auto-seleccionar una identidad de género, pero los cambios de nombre/género requieren una visita al consultorio. Para corregir un error o un nombre mal escrito en una licencia de conducir o tarjeta de identificación, también se requiere una visita a la oficina.

qna.a:
To find the status of your Virtual Office case, select the Check Your Case Status link below. Here are some answers to some frequently asked questions.

How do I add or upload documents to an existing case? Please respond to the email sent from DMV by selecting "Reply", which will include the subject line that pertains to the individual case. Check your junk folder, if you do not see an email from DMV.

Why is my case abandoned? DMV sent 3 emails asking for further documentation or payment, and we did not receive a response within 30 days.

Why is my case closed? DMV has not received a response to the original email within 30 days, or your transaction is not available through Virtual Field Office.
 
What if I lost my case number? The case number is included in all emails sent from DMV. If you cannot locate any of DMV's emails, check your junk folder or call our Contact Center at 1-800-777-0133 for further assistance.

Where do I get help with my case? Please respond to the email sent from DMV by selecting "Reply", which will include the subject line that pertains to the individual case. The case management team will respond back by email. Check your junk folder, if you do not see an email from DMV.
{{#ifCond SessionAttributes.QNAClientFilter '===' 'miles'}}
 * [Check your case status](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/dmv-virtual-office/case-status/)
{{/ifCond}}

qna.a:
If you are 70 years or older when your driver’s license expires, you are required to renew your driver’s license in person and pass a vision test unless otherwise instructed by DMV. Knowledge tests and training are no longer required for most senior drivers. If you have no accidents or citations, you may skip the test. 

If you are required to pass a knowledge test, select “eLearning” when completing the online application for a fast, no fail option. You can complete a Driver’s License and ID Application online or at a DMV office.

{{#ifCond SessionAttributes.QNAClientFilter '===' 'miles'}}

* [Driver’s License and ID Card Application](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/driver-licenses-identification-cards/dl-id-online-app-edl-44/)

qna.a:
California’s mobile driver’s license/identification card (mDL) is a free, easy, secure, and convenient digital ID. It is available through the CA DMV Wallet app (App Store and Google Play), the Apple Wallet on iPhone and Apple Watch, and the Google Wallet on Android devices. Enroll in the mDL pilot and try it! qna.a:
You can take a driver’s license knowledge test online. Fill out the online driver’s license application and choose either an online knowledge test or interactive eLearning course.

• The eLearning course takes between 20 and 40 minutes and is currently available in English, Spanish, and Traditional Chinese. It is ideal if you are renewing your license or prefer an alternative no-fail learning method.

The online knowledge test is available in over 35 languages. You need an internet-ready desktop or laptop with a webcam; the test cannot be taken on a tablet or mobile device. Take the online exam between 8 a.m. and 4 p.m. Monday through Friday, excluding state holidays.

For your security, online testers are required to verify identity and agree to be monitored throughout the exam.

{{#ifCond SessionAttributes.QNAClientFilter '===' 'miles'}}

qna.a:
Si tiene 70 años o más cuando vence su licencia de manejar, debe renovarla en persona y aprobar un examen de la vista, a menos que el DMV le indique lo contrario. Los exámenes de conocimientos y la capacitación ya no son necesarios para la mayoría de los conductores mayores. Si no tiene accidentes ni infracciones, puede omitir el examen.

Si debe aprobar un examen de conocimientos, seleccione “eLearning” al completar la solicitud en línea para obtener una opción rápida y sin fallas. Puede completar una solicitud de licencia de manejar e identificación en línea o en una oficina del DMV.

To transfer vehicle ownership into your name, submit the California Certificate of Title (Pink Slip) signed and dated by both parties, transfer fees, a smog, and sales tax. This includes a sale, gift, donation, inheritance, adding or deleting an owner or satisfaction of a lien.

qna.a:
To find the status of your Virtual Office case, select the Check Your Case Status link below. Here are some answers to some frequently asked questions.

How do I add or upload documents to an existing case? Please respond to the email sent from DMV by selecting "Reply", which will include the subject line that pertains to the individual case. Check your junk folder, if you do not see an email from DMV.

Why is my case abandoned? DMV sent 3 emails asking for further documentation or payment, and we did not receive a response within 30 days.

Why is my case closed? DMV has not received a response to the original email within 30 days, or your transaction is not available through Virtual Field Office.
 
What if I lost my case number? The case number is included in all emails sent from DMV. If you cannot locate any of DMV's emails, check your junk folder or call our Contact Center at 1-800-777-0133 for further assistance.

Where do I get help with my case? Please respond to the email sent from DMV by selecting "Reply", which will include the subject line that pertains to the individual case. The case management team will respond back by email. Check your junk folder, if you do not see an email from DMV.
{{#ifCond SessionAttributes.QNAClientFilter '===' 'miles'}}
 * [Check your case status](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/dmv-virtual-office/case-status/)
{{/ifCond}}

qna.a:
To verify the address DMV has on file, log in to your MyDMV account and view it there. You can submit a change of address request online in your MyDMV account or by mail. Please allow 3 business days for processing once the request is received by DMV. You will not receive a new driver's license, ID, or registration card when you change your address. To obtain a replacement card with your updated address, apply online or at a DMV kiosk after the address change is reflected in DMV systems.
{{#ifCond SessionAttributes.QNAClientFilter '===' 'miles'}}
* [Change Address Online](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/dmv/detail/online/coa/welcome)
* [Change Address by Mail](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/file/notice-of-change-of-address-dmv-14-form-pdf/)
* [Replacement DL/ID Card](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/driver-licenses-identification-cards/replace-your-driver-license-or-identification-dl-id-card/)

qna.a:
An instruction permit is for individuals who are working on the requirements to get a driver's license for autos and/or motorcycles. If you are under 18 years old, you must complete classroom driver's education and enroll in behind-the-wheel driver's training at a licensed driver's training school before you can get your instruction permit. Note: Visit a DMV office to obtain a replacement instruction permit. The expiration date remains the same.
{{#ifCond SessionAttributes.QNAClientFilter '===' 'miles'}}

* [Driver's Handbooks](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/driver-handbooks/)

qna.a:
Beginning May 7, 2025, a REAL ID will be required to board flights within the U.S., and to enter secure federal facilities or military bases. To apply for a REAL ID driver's license or identification card, federal regulations require you to present 1 identity document, 2 residency documents, and provide your social security number. To save time, upload your documents for review before your visit.   Note: A REAL ID is a driver's license or identification card with a certification added to make it a federally accepted form of identification. It is not a separate card. Minors are not required to have a REAL ID. Get a REAL ID at select AAA offices for a limited time by appointment only. For more information, select the REAL ID at AAA Offices link below.

{{#ifCond SessionAttributes.QNAClientFilter '===' 'miles'}} 
* [What Is REAL ID?](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/driver-licenses-identification-cards/real-id/what-is-real-id/) 
* [How do I get a REAL ID](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/driver-licenses-identification-cards/real-id/how-do-i-get-a-real-id/) 
* [REAL ID at AAA](https://www.dmv.ca.gov/portal/aaa-real-id/) 
* [REAL ID Step by Step Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ie9idjlUhiY)
